entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Twillingate
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:18 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Twillingate 05:30 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: -2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -4.0°C
Wind: ENE 41 km/h gust 57 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or snow changing to freezing rain this morning then to rain showers near noon. Ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature rising to 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 40 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Fog patches. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023
